key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions
Economic sensitivity to construction and infrastructure spending
Regulatory risks from environmental, safety, and product standards
Legal challenges including patent infringement and breach of contract lawsuits
controversies: Patent infringement lawsuits, including one from Kortek
Breach of contract lawsuit from M3 alleging unfair dealing
environmental_issues: History of environmental violations and EPA penalties
Commitment to sustainability initiatives with a 30% reduction target
social_issues: Employee concerns over poor working conditions, low pay, and inadequate leadership
History of labor violations and unfair labor practices
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance risks and potential costs
Reputational risks from legal and environmental challenges

sources.title: US Company Accuses Danish Carrier of Violating Shipping Laws ...
